item.title: Publish your next Hugo blog post automatically using Github Actions
item.description: The Challenge I wanted to be able to publish a new post that has already been written at a future date, without needing to manaully publish the article. The Solution Github Actions. I already push updates to my site using github actions. So I thought why not have articles published in the future after they are written. A little background. I do all my edits in a private GitHub repo. When I push to master in this repo.
